text.data: Queen Campbell: There is nothing for you. You've captured Campbell... And someday you'll rule the world... But you'll never be satisfied...[end]

Even if you knew the legend of the Holy Dragons, what could you do?
The one who will bring about a new era...
That person is not you!![end]
Sauzer: Where am I... What happened?[end]
Palpaleos: Sauzer... This is your room. Don't you remember? The Holy Dragon awoke.[end]

Sauzer: The Holy Dragon's power... It knocked me unconscious...?
So Princess [character][0x1] was able to control it after all... Is she all right?[end]

Palpaleos: She has returned to the Resistance...
But she's not the only one. Campbell has already fallen as well.[end]

Sauzer: I've done something terrible...
Palpaleos. Where did the Resistance go? Are they heading for the Holy Dragons?[end]
Palpaleos: Sauzer, you still need to rest... We shall protect Granbelos for you.[end]
Sauzer: The one who reads the minds of the Holy Dragons shall open the door to a new era... Just what did Valitora say to Princess [character][0x1]?[end]

I, Sauzer, will be the one to bring about the new era!
Listen, Palpaleos. We must not allow the Resistance to continue!!
The way to read the minds of the Holy Dragons... Very soon... The legendary Holy Dragons... The new era... They shall be mine.[end]
Forgive me, Palpaleos...[end]
Reading the Holy Dragons' minds... Doing so means I will no longer be myself. When I change, Palpaleos... Take charge of the Granbelos Empire...[end]
This human is the one we will choose?[end]
The suitable human we will entrust with the doorway to the new era...[end]
The one who will bring peace... To our confused minds... With his power...[end]

Sauzer: Monsters...
No, guardians of the Holy Dragons...
First, allow me to express my gratitude for your choosing me...
However, let me ask you one thing. Why... did you choose me?[end]

Emperor Sauzer of the Granbelos Empire...
Great Conqueror of the Human World...
But you know of the emptiness of those titles.[end]
And you know the pain of fighting...[end]
The doorway to the new era cannot be opened by a weak-minded human. Nor by we monsters... Read the minds of the Holy Dragons, and open the doorway for us...[end]
Sauzer: Monsters...[end]
Let it begin.[end]
The minds of the Holy Dragons... So these are their thoughts...[end]
Unnngh!![end]
Palpaleos: The disaster in the sky seems to have subsided... Do you know what's happening up there, Sauzer?[end]
Sauzer: Palpaleos... The sky... I want to look at it with you when the end comes...[end]
Palpaleos: When the end comes?[end]
Sauzer: How dazzling... The sky is... always glittering... Dreams... legends... Everything is in this sky...[end]
Palpaleos: Sauzer...[end]
Sauzer: Am I... human...? The emperor of the human world...?[end]
There were children who looked up to me... [0x24]If it's for the Emperor we'll risk our lives and fight...[0x22][end]

This empire that I created... The children born there will wage war...
They will follow the same path as I have...[end]

This is all mine...
What I have been wanting...[end]
Palpaleos... There is someone you must protect... As Emperor of the Granbelos Empire I order you...[end]
General Palpaleos!! Go to Kahna!! Protect the skies of Orelus with the Resistance!![end]

That is the order of the Emperor... Do not disobey, Palpaleos...
Protect the one most important to you...[end]

The sky... The light of the sky... Do you know the depths of darkness...
I am in darkness... The very deepest darkness...[end][end]
